Name: Kallithea
Description: A lively neighborhood with a mix of residential homes, shops, and eateries, providing a vibrant atmosphere.

Name: Aigaleo Center
Description: The commercial heart of Aigaleo, filled with retail shops, cafes, and busy streets.

Name: Agios Ioannis
